SEARCH
Package jpacman.model

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
jpacman.model.Cell
public class Cell extends Object
A Cell keeps track of its (x,y) position on the board, and the potential Guest occupying the Cell. It's responsibilities include identifying neighbouring cells that fall within the Board's borders (to support moving guests on the board), and keeping the Cell-Guest association consistent.
Version:
$Id: Cell.java,v 1.9 2008/02/03 19:43:38 arie Exp $
Author:
Arie van Deursen; Jul 27, 2003

      Returns:

      protected boolean boardInvariant()
      A Cell should always be part of the Board given at construction.
      Returns:
      true iff this is the case.

      Returns:
      true iff the invariant for guest association holds.

    • getInhabitant

      public Guest getInhabitant()
      Return the inhabitant of this cell.
      Returns:

    • cellAtOffset

      public Cell cellAtOffset(int dx, int dy)
      Return the cell located at position (x + dx, y + dy), or null if this cell would fall beyond the borders of the Board.
      Parameters:
      dx - The x offset
      dy - The y offset
      Returns:
      null or the cell at (x+dx,y+dy).
